message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be fairer to each other. This offer accounts for the time value of money and gives us both a better deal than waiting.
Bob, this offer still accounts for the time pressure we both face, but offers a slightly better deal for me considering I'm losing value faster.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Let's end this before we both lose out more.
